TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ObjectAce extends System.Security.AccessControl.QualifiedAce
Public NotInheritable Class ObjectAce Inherits QualifiedAce

summary.span: Controlla l'accesso agli oggetti di servizi directory.

span.span: Controls access to Directory Services objects.

summary.span: Questa classe rappresenta una voce di controllo di accesso (ACE, Access Control Entry) associata all'oggetto directory.

span.span: This class represents an Access Control Entry (ACE) associated with a directory object.
